protein.general_function: Involved in transferase activity, transferring hexosyl groups
protein.specific_function: Glycosyltransferase required for the biosynthesis of heparan-sulfate. The EXT1/EXT2 complex possesses substantially higher glycosyltransferase activity than EXT1 or EXT2 alone. Appears to be a tumor suppressor.

go_class.description: heparan sulfate proteoglycan biosynthetic process, polysaccharide chain biosynthetic process
